page.title: 13A pupil at school.
page.content: I get up at about eight o'clock. I have my breakfast and then I get ready for{school.}The school mini bus comes at about quarter to nine. We get to school at about nine o' clock and play for half an hour. We go into school at half past nine and we do our mental questions and then we do our spelling. We get our interval at twenty to eleven. When we come back in we do our maths and then perhaps our Roads and Transport worksheets. We get our lunch at half past twelve and then we have our interval. We come in again at half past one. We sometimes get read a story or we do our reading.We get out at 2.30 and then we get our gym lesson.At quarter to four we go home.I go to{drumming practice}on Wednesday evening and I go to{Highland Dancing } practice on Thursday.
